description: Admin/ops dashboard for monitoring data freshness, table statistics, scraper health, and data coverage. Displays live database metrics with auto-refresh capabilities.
goal: Provide visibility into the health and status of the NFL data platform - know when data was last updated, how much data exists, and identify any gaps or issues.
requirements: Data freshness indicators - show last updated time per table with color-coded status (green/yellow/red)
Row counts per table - display total rows for each database table
Coverage map - visual grid showing what seasons/weeks have data
Recent activity log - show last N scraper events with timestamps
Auto-refresh every 30s for live monitoring feel
Dedicated /admin route separate from user-facing pages
out_of_scope: User authentication - no login required for v1
Scraper controls - read-only, no manual trigger buttons (optional enhancement)
constraints: Use existing shadcn/ui components (Card, Table, Badge, Tabs)
Follow existing app styling (dark theme, same fonts)
Hybrid data fetching - server render + client auto-refresh
Match patterns from existing pages like /data-maps
